content: *this design is inspired by traditional tribal/ethnic prints i love their black lines mirrored images and geometric shapes but especially their meaning and history their cultural importance is significant * *this scarf is made using **overlay mosaic crochet technique** with the pattern visible on both sides using the negative stitch it contains a digital chart mosaic crochet explanation negative stitch explanations advice on how to read the chart photos **full written instructions*** *the actual digital chart is 77 stitches by 47 row = scarf size approx 127 x 20 cm * *each chart can be used to make the scarf a pillow a bag anything you like…your creativity has no boundaries and i would love to see what you make * *you will need two contrasting colours to make this pattern i have used dk / 8 ply yarn 1 x 100g balls of black yarn 1 x 100g ball of white yarn 100g = approx 280m* *this pattern has been designed by me sarka baran - sharka s magic crochet and is protected by international copyright law please do not copy share display or redistribute this pattern without the owner s permission this includes sharing photos of parts of the charts with others * *you are more than welcome to sell your finished items using this pattern/charts but i would appreciate if you could give me credit for the pattern if possible if you would like to contact me you can message me through ravelry or facebook *
